Returns a default-constructed {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}} object. 

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A default-constructed {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}} object.

=== Notes ===
{{tt|polymorphic_allocator}}s do not propagate on container copy construction.
